name: Rich Mellor t as SellMyRetro
goal:
Small business start-up promoting re-use of vintage electronics and retro computers, rather than them being thrown away.

We operate through offering a dedicated marketplace and also actively taking part in various online forums for the promotion and assistance of users of vintage electronics and retro computers.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, EU VAT Regulations on e-services, VATMOSS and cross-border transactions
